outline:
1. to thunder
    1. (Qal)
      1. to make the sound of thunder, thunder
      2. to rage
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to thunder, cause thunder
      2. to tremble, cause to tremble (by extension)
kjv_def: make to fret, roar, thunder, trouble.
strongs_def: to tumble, i.e. be violently agitated; specifically, to crash (of thunder); figuratively, to irritate (with anger)
